animetric 0.2.1

Compute numerical derivatives on possibly uneven grids

Source: R/differentiate.R
compute_gradient.Rd

This helper implements a finite‑difference scheme based on the Fornberg formula for interior points when the spacing between coordinates is non‑uniform. End points use first‑order forward/backward differences.

Usage

compute_gradient(values, coords = NULL)

Arguments

values

Numeric vector of function values.

coords

Numeric vector of the corresponding coordinate values. Must be the same length as values.

Value

A numeric vector of the same length as values containing the estimated first derivative at each point.
